definition: grain that has begun to ripen/variant of 衹|只[zhi3]
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

If you work at it hard enough, you can grind an iron bar into a needle./cf idiom 磨杵成針|磨杵成针, to grind an iron bar down to a fine needle (idiom); fig. to persevere in a difficult task/to study diligently
pinyin: zhi3 yao4 gong1 fu5 shen1 , tie3 chu3 mo2 cheng2 zhen1
containing_words.word: 只要功夫深，铁杵磨成针

sentences.english: Just put me off the train at Dijon anyway.
sentences.chinese: 总之，只要让我在第戎下火车就行。

sentences.english: All you have to do to win is unscramble the words here to find four names of birds.
sentences.chinese: 只要你能从这些单词中找到四种鸟的名称你就赢了。

sentences.english: As you can see, as long as the initial value is above zero, this function will terminate.
sentences.chinese: 可见，只要初始值大于零，这个函数就能够终止。

sentences.english: If only I could get out of my timidness, I would feel better.
sentences.chinese: 只要我改掉自己胆怯的缺点，我就能感觉好点。

sentences.english: Light abolishes darkness merely by showing you it is not there.
sentences.chinese: 光明只要让你看到黑暗并不存在。

sentences.english: So long as opens the mouth to sing, lengthens until the dream, hears the echo to be resonant.
sentences.chinese: 只要开口唱，直到梦想延长，听到回音多嘹亮。

sentences.english: I feel pain here whenever I drink something cold .
sentences.chinese: 我只要一喝冷的东西就觉得这里痛。

sentences.english: Again, I'm not opposed to long-term deficit reduction, so long as it's equitable.
sentences.chinese: 同样，我不反对长期削减赤字，只要它的公平。

sentences.english: I would try to maximize my combat capability, as long as this process goes on," he said.
sentences.chinese: 只要这个过程还在继续，我就会尽量加大战斗能力。

sentences.english: Free bags, even under other  guises, would be banned.
sentences.chinese: 只要是免费塑料袋，不论以何形式提供都予以禁止。

sentences.english: As long as we unite and help each other, no one can conquer us.
sentences.chinese: 只要我们团结互助，谁也不能征服我们。

sentences.english: I finally reach Leifeng, the entry fee a bargain 40 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 最后我来到雷锋塔，门票很便宜，只要40元。

sentences.english: He's a little kiss-ass bastard who'll do anything to get ahead.
sentences.chinese: 那个小混蛋是个马屁精，只要能往上爬，他啥事都干。

sentences.english: When it is cloudy, i am cold, impuissant and sad.
sentences.chinese: 只要天气阴暗，我就会非常的冷漠，无奈，甚至悲伤。

sentences.english: Just keep looking at this progress of losing and regaining awareness and learn from it.
sentences.chinese: 只要保持观照这个觉知失而复得的过程，并从中学习。

definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
in case (sth happens)/if/once (sth happens, then...)/when/in a short time/in one day
not to be concerned/regardless of/no matter
